entry.summary: premise: Static members in a class. note: The static keyword is only used with the declaration of a static member, inside the class definition, but not with the definition of that static member; class X { public: static int n; // declaration, incomplete type static void f(); // declaration, incomplete type }; int X::n = 1; // definition, complete type void X::f() {n =...

entry.title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
entry.summary: https://leetcode.cn/problems/median-of-two-sorted-arrays/ Given two sorted arrays nums1 and nums2 of size m and n respectively, return the median of the two sorted arrays. The overall run time complexity should be O(log (m+n)). class Solution { public: double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) { // make nums1 is the shorter array ...

entry.title: CMU 15-213 Notes
entry.summary: Write-through When a page was modified in cache, it will write to the disk immediately. Write-back When a page was kicked out of cache, it write to the disk.
